title: Summer pudding loaf
description: This is an easier to make version of the classic summer pudding that everyone loves so much and is easy to serve being loaf shaped.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz mixed summer berries: blueberries, raspberries, blackberries, redcurrants, blackcurrants
1 large unsliced white loaf or thick-sliced white bread (preferably slightly stale)
